title: 75 Floral Blocks to Crochet: Beautiful Patterns to Mix and Match
description: Bring the beauty of the garden indoors with this floral themed collection 75 Floral Blocks to Crochet is a charming collection of square, triangular, diamond, and hexagonal blocks, all with a floral themeÃ¯Â¿Â½from traditional blanket squares with petals and rosebuds to colorful blocks with three-dimensional flowers and butterfliesÃ¯Â¿Â½there's something here to inspire every crochet fan. Great for crafters "on the go" itÃ¯Â¿Â½s easy to work a few blocks while traveling or commuting. Then when all the blocks are complete you can assemble a whole project at your leisure.The book includes: "Useful Techniques" offering directions on constructionÃ¯Â¿Â½in straight rows, in the round, or corner-to-cornerÃ¯Â¿Â½plus how to join blocks and create edgings. The "Block Directory," categorized by shape, showcases the designs which are cross-referenced to the row-by-row (or round-by-round) written instructions, as well as easy-to-follow charts. Additional information indicating the direction of working, skill level, and the number of colors needed is also included. Lastly, "Creative Projects" helps you make your own choice of blocks to create stunning projects including throws, afghans, shawls, and more!
